channel.title: How to change Special Attack accuracy and add custom capes on Shard Revolution
channel.description:
If someone can please help me change Special Attack accuracy on a particular weapon, and add custom capes on a shard revolutions base it would be super appreciated.
For custom capes, I followed a tutorial for PI/Delta bases and set it up and the custom cape in the shop. It shows up but gives an ArrayOutOfBounds error. I tried for hours to fix it but I can't find a way to fix it. I added the ID to the class8.java file server side, added the int to Item.java, under the capes[] array but no matter what I change it giving the outofbounds error.
For the special attack accuracy, I don't see any way to edit it. The only thing I can change is the damage multiplier.
Any help/pointers would be greatly appreciated.
Thank you so much!

item.title: How to change Special Attack accuracy and add custom capes on Shard Revolution
item.dc:creator: @xavier786 xavier786
item.description:
@xavier786 wrote:

If someone can please help me change Special Attack accuracy on a particular weapon, and add custom capes on a shard revolutions base it would be super appreciated.

For custom capes, I followed a tutorial for PI/Delta bases and set it up and the custom cape in the shop. It shows up but gives an ArrayOutOfBounds error. I tried for hours to fix it but I can’t find a way to fix it. I added the ID to the class8.java file server side, added the int to Item.java, under the capes[] array but no matter what I change it giving the outofbounds error.

For the special attack accuracy, I don’t see any way to edit it. The only thing I can change is the damage multiplier.

Any help/pointers would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you so much!
